name: Yoru/Asa Mitaka (Chainsaw Man) LoRA
description:
Yoru/Asa Mitaka (Chainsaw Man) LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

The main trigger word is AsaCSM. The weight should be ~1, and the CFG should be 6-9.
